result.name: STORM_CLUSTER_TOPOLOGIES
result.description: Number of topologies running on the cluster.

result.name: STORM_CLUSTER_EXECUTORS
result.description: Total number of executors running on the cluster.

result.name: STORM_CLUSTER_SLOTS_TOTAL
result.description: Total number of available worker slots on the cluster.

result.name: STORM_CLUSTER_SLOTS_USED
result.description: Number of worker slots used on the cluster.

result.name: STORM_CLUSTER_TASKS_TOTAL
result.description: Total number of tasks on the cluster.

result.name: STORM_TOPOLOGY_EMITTED
result.description: Number of messages emitted per topology per second.

result.name: STORM_TOPOLOGY_TRANSFERRED
result.description: Number messages transferred per topology per second.

result.name: STORM_TOPOLOGY_ACKED
result.description: Number messages acked per topology per second.

result.name: STORM_TOPOLOGY_FAILED
result.description: Number messages failed per topology per second.

result.name: STORM_TOPOLOGY_COMPLETELATENCY
result.description: Total latency for processing messages per topology per second.

result.name: STORM_BOLT_EXECUTORS
result.description: Number of executor tasks in the bolt component.

result.name: STORM_BOLT_TASKS
result.description: Number of instances of bolt.

result.name: STORM_BOLT_EMITTED
result.description: Number of tuples emitted per bolt per second.

result.name: STORM_BOLT_ACKED
result.description: Number of tuples acked by the bolt per second.

result.name: STORM_BOLT_FAILED
result.description: Number of tuples failed by the bolt per second.

result.name: STORM_BOLT_CAPACITY
result.description: Number of messages executed * average execute latency per second.

result.name: STORM_BOLT_EXECUTELATENCY
result.description: Average time to run the execute method of the bolt per second.

result.name: STORM_BOLT_PROCESSLATENCY
result.description: Average time of the bolt to ack a message after it was received per second.

result.name: STORM_SPOUT_EXECUTORS
result.description: Number of executors for the spout.

result.name: STORM_SPOUT_TASKS
result.description: Total number of tasks for the spout.

result.name: STORM_SPOUT_EMITTED
result.description: Number of messages emitted per spout per second.

result.name: STORM_SPOUT_ACKED
result.description: Number of messages acked per spout per second.

result.name: STORM_SPOUT_FAILED
result.description: Number of messages failed per spout per second.

result.name: STORM_SPOUT_COMPLETELATENCY
result.description: Total latency for processing the message per spout per second.
